Tags / main part

no-margin

Second-part support true
Containing bugs true

last edited

Removes any margin of an element.

                        class="no-margin"
                    
                            class="no-margin-t"
                        
                            class="no-margin-b"
                        
                            class="no-margin-l"
                        
                            class="no-margin-r"
                        
                            class="no-margin-y"
                        
                            class="no-margin-x"
No Display

Remove an element
No Outline

Remove the outline of an element.
